title: A bug in v2.5.0
content:
There is a known bug in v2.5.0 where frame duration cannot be adjusted. If you've encountered this issue, I'm so sorry about that.
To address this, hotfix v2.5.1 has been submitted to the App Store and is waiting to be reviewed, hopefully it will be available soon.
Again, I'm very sorry for letting this bug slip through to production.
